entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who spoke in a ringing voice and warned Tom Riddle against continued thievery. ("So,' said Dumbledore, 'we meet this evening to continue the tale of Tom Riddle... You will remember how excited he was to hear that he was a wizard, that he refused my company on a trip to Diagon Alley and that I, in turn, warned him ag ainst continued thievery when he arrived at school.")
